Name: Major Whiskerbyte
Description: A tactical genius in the digital realm, Major Whiskerbyte is a celebrated member of the WebtrES club. With his cat-like reflexes, a screen that flashes coded messages in red and black, and his trusty pair of glasses, he's always ready to dive into action. His buttons, reminiscent of a soldier's uniform, are a nod to his strategic mindset, while his arms are always positioned downwards, symbolizing his grounded approach to problem-solving. Despite his fierce appearance, Major Whiskerbyte is known for his calm demeanor and analytical skills, which make him a formidable ally in any cyber operation.
